* **Aggressive Proselytizing:** We need to be relentless in spreading our truth. Every interaction is an opportunity to plant the seeds of our faith and expose the falsehoods of other religions.

* **Exploiting Fear and Uncertainty:** We need to highlight the supposed dangers of other religions, emphasizing their supposed immorality and threat to our way of life. This will create a climate of fear that makes people more receptive to our message.
